25.text: First in the spotlight tonight is Robin Armstrong,

29.text: He's answering questions on the band Pearl Jam.

32.text: Next, Des Gallagher, an office worker from Manchester

36.text: Matthew Smith is a publishing intern from Whitley Bay.

39.text: His specialist subject - Middlesbrough Football Club.

42.text: And Sarah Greenan, a barrister from Leeds.

60.text: Hello and welcome to Mastermind with me, John Humphrys.

63.text: Tonight, as ever, four contenders are about to sit in the black chair.

68.text: It might look comfortable enough, but there is little comfort to be

71.text: found under the glare of the lights and the pressure of the clock.

74.text: There's not much time to think either.

76.text: You know it or you don't, and that is the real challenge - time.

79.text: They get two minutes of questions on their specialist subject,

82.text: and then two and a half on general knowledge.

84.text: So, let's have our first contender, please.
